name: Trapped In A Hoax
description:
Jane and Joe, proud members of local conspiracy club were debating about the latest theory they stumbled upon. 

They both agreed it's something big. Bigger than dissection of an alien family in Area 51, bigger than all theories about Dallas 1963, bigger than 'that attack was an inside job' theory.

And the last thing they both remember was a big bright light and then came just dark void. They woke up trapped in this strange maze. Who's behind all of this? 

Source code @ GitHub
